column4: Can someone tell me why my Volume keys on my keyboard don't actually affect the volume?  They increase/decrease SOME volume bar, but doesn't affect the actual output.
search for a bug report on file a new one at launchpad.net
I don't think it's a bug.  I think the Volume keys are changing the volume for the wrong device.
if you don't see how to set/change such device, it's a bug :)
